amendment.description: An amendment comprised of the following amendments offered En bloc No. 2: Amendments Nos. 1, 6, 24, 28, 33, 52, 54, and 70.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Calvert amendments (A063) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendments en bloc (A063) offered by Mr. Calvert.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
